yap.translation[0].definitions[0].defini: if a small dog yaps, it barks (=makes short loud sounds) in an excited way
yap.translation[0].definitions[1].defini: to talk in a noisy and annoying way
yap.translation[0].definitions[1].exampl: Some guy was yapping on his cell phone.
